discussion_comments.comment_body:
please don't add anthropic as a core dep on litellm 

if you need this in your test you can add it on .circle/config.yaml

The reason this was added to use anthropic SDK's pydantic to directly validate the response. @krrishdholakia had suggested it. Let me know if we still want to use. If not, I can compare the pydantic keys myself.
I understand. You can use it in your test but please don't add this as a core dependency to the litellm pip package.
there should be no modification to pyproject.toml

@krrishdholakia when I run make test-unit locally, this failure occurs, because of a missing dependency in the pyproject.toml.  Hence the modifications. I can't see the CI runs in GH.

Can you confirm that you can successfully run make test-unit and have this test pass locally on Python 3.10?

FAILED tests/test_litellm/google_genai/test_google_genai_main.py::test_agenerate_content_stream -
  litellm.exceptions.APIConnectionError: litellm.APIConnectionError: No module named 'google.genai'
please add this as optional, see uvicorn example below

> this should be in `[tool.poetry.extras]`

Fixed in 2da6e31ad.
